Key Match Events: Turkey was reduced to 10 men after Baris Alper Yilmaz received a red card for a second booking.
Wales dominated possession but failed to capitalize on their numerical advantage.
Kevin De Bruyne scored a brace for Belgium in their match against Israel.
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy made his debut as Wales manager in this match.
Wales were aiming to secure promotion to a higher Nations League division after their performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy expressed satisfaction with the team's performance despite the draw.
Wales showed positive signs under their new manager's leadership.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Cardiff City Stadium.
Turkey struggled to create chances and were reliant on counterattacks.
